DOC.brief_summary: To assess bioequivalence Loratadine Oral Solution/Syrup 1mg/mL ( GPLA Formula ) versus Claritin Peach Syrup 1mg/mL ( ANNA Formula )
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Bioequivalence Loratadine Oral Solution/Syrup Versus Claritin Peach Syrup
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult ( men woman ) , age 18 55 year inclusive ; Body mass index 18.5 30.0 kg/m*2 inclusive ; Able read understand write informed consent studyrelated information instruction ; Able comply protocol requirement , include overnight stay , blood sample collection define protocol ; Agree donate whole blood component blood ( e.g . plasma , thrombocyte ) start sign informed consent form 30 day last study procedure , except blood sample collect study ; Female subject childbearing potential must use medically acceptable form birth control least 1 month prior screen ( 3 month oral contraceptive ) , e.g. , oral patch contraceptive , intrauterine device , injectable contraceptive ( e.g . DepoProvera ) , double barrier negative pregnancy test Screening prior study drug administration Day 0 Dosing Periods 1 2 . Female subject nonchildbearing potential must amenorrheic least two year hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy ; Preexisting diseases assumed absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal ; Known hypersensitivity medication ( active substance excipients preparation ) use study ; Known galactose intolerance , lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Known severe allergy ( e.g . allergy 3 allergen , allergy affect low respiratory tract allergic asthma , allergy require therapy corticosteroid ) ; Use , within 1 month first study drug administration , systemic topical medicine substance might affect study objective , e.g drug know induce cytochrome P3A4/5 P Glycoprotein ( e.g . rifampin , carbamazepine , St. John 's wort ) ; drug know inhibit cytochrome P3A4/5 P Glycoprotein ( e.g . erythromycin , clarithromycin , chloramphenicol , ketoconazole ) ; drug know induce cytochrome P2D6 ( e.g . rifampin , dexamethasone ) ; drug know inhibit cytochrome P2D6 ( e.g . cimetidine , desipramine , fluoxetine , metoclopramide ) ; Positive urine pregnancy , urine drug test Hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV test ; Clinically relevant finding physical examination , e.g. , sign bleed diathesis , sign heart failure , evidence peripheral circulatory disturbance , skin abnormality ;
